Name: Insert a guy on the left
Insert a guy on the right
Still Me
Text: <size=50><color=#fb4141>So red</color></size><size=30> ← Size of characters can be changed </size>Param3: Sprite Flip

Name: <size=45>Look forward to a Nier rerun (?)</size>
Text: param1: On the right of sprite display; Plus a sprite flip; Plus the size change of the characters of the name in display

Name: It seems there's not going to be a rerun.

Text: "Lucia, the coordinates of the first node have been transmitted."

Name: Yazi
Text: "This is safer than outside, but we can't let our guard down yet."

Name: Yazi
Text: "If you don't need me, I'll go back to patrolling. (Related to Pulao's mood; help her do some work.)"

Name: Yazi
Text: (Thanks again for getting her umbrella back)

Name: Yazi
Text: Nothing unusual in Tabula Akasha. (Continue patrolling)

Name: Chrome
Text: She might have left it during the evacuation.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah. Let's give it back to her.

Name: Pulao
Text: I wonder how it is going out there...

Name: [Investigate]
Text: <color=#D1D1D1>A Kowloong resident who failed to evacuate. All vital signs are lost.</color>

Name: [Investigate]
Text: <color=#D1D1D1>A barely recognizable body of an old human that has been burned by the Light Wall.</color>

Name: Chrome
Text: I can't believe they dodged the Light Wall...

Name: Chrome
Text: Two more backup redundancy nodes to configure.

Name: Lucia
Text: The first node is on standby now.

Name: Communication - Commandant
Text: There's no time. We can't afford a loss.

Name: Lucia
Text: Got it. Heading to the next area.

Name: Lucia
Text: "Just a sneak attack. Don't worry, Commandant."

Name: Communication - Commandant
Text: You're in charge now. Watch your back.

Name: Lucia
Text: "Roger that, Commandant... Hmm? The communication... is interrupted?"

Name: Pulao
Text: The Punishing signals must have interfered with the long-wave transmission! We must stop them from destroying the Light Wall node!

Name: Chrome
Text: We must configure the next set of coordinates as soon as possible. There's no time.

Name: Lucia
Text: "I'll bring up the rear. Go, Pulao. You know the place better."

Name: Chrome
Text: "Make sure you withdraw in time once you finish the configuration, Lucia."

Name: Pulao
Text: The setup on the other side is completed. I'm just worried about you.

Name: Chrome
Text: The processing nodes are our top priority now.

Name: Chrome
Text: "Once you finish, go help Lucia immediately."

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmm? Where did we come from?

Name: Chrome
Text: All we need to do now is calibrate the coordinates...

Name: Chrome
Text: "Lucia, your priority is to configure the Light Wall."

Name: Chrome
Text: "Lucia, that's not where the coordinates Commandant sent are."

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmm? Is it this way? Doesn't look very familiar to me...

Name: <color=#d95e32>Angry</color> <color=#ededed>Fallen Stone Lion</color>
Text: I'm a stone lion. Not a dead lion...

Name: [Investigate]
Text: <color=#D1D1D1>A Guardian I with its key component damaged. Barely conscious.</color>

Name: Injured Guardian
Text: "We could only set up obstacles along the way, but they couldn't be stopped..."

Name: Injured Guardian
Text: I will fight... till the last moment...

Name: Chrome
Text: "I don't know if it's the right model, but you should be able to install it."

Name: Chrome
Text: "Sorry, but there's nothing I can do."

Name: Injured Guardian
Text: "Argh... Tell me, did we manage to... hold the line?"

Name: Injured Guardian
Text: Rebooting battle protocol... I'll be back soon.

Name: Pulao
Text: The calibration of Light Wall node... is complete!

Name: Pulao
Text: But it's so quiet here. I don't see any enemies on the street...
"<color=#D1D1D1><size=35>Kowloong - Rebooting Light Wall </size></color>\n<size=28>No. 57 Light Wall Node</size>\n<size=28>Nov 9, 20:57</size>"

Name: Liv
Text: We are running out of time!

Name: Liv
Text: We should be able to start the elevator.

Name: Chrome
Text: We need to evacuate the civilians!

Name: Chrome
Text: Are they ever going to stop?

Name: Lee
Text: The evacuation is complete. I'm back.

Name: Lee
Text: "Meanwhile, I'll continue to provide long-range support."

Name: Liv
Text: The elevator should be on the other side.

Name: Chrome
Text: "Right now, the priority is to establish a line of defense on Level 2."

Name: Liv
Text: It probably needs a power supply...

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's go to the other side.

Name: Chrome
Text: Move to the right. The mission will continue.
"<color=#D1D1D1><size=35>Tabula Akasha Central Control Room</size></color>\n<size=28>To Fight, or to Die</size>\n<size=28>30 minutes till Huaxu's firewall collapses</size>"

Name: Lee
Text: No problem. Level 2 is all settled. Commandant and I have come down to double check the situation.

Name: Chrome
Text: "I'll leave this place to you, Gray Raven. Kamui and others are still in the outer engineering tunnel. I'll go meet them now."

Name: Chrome
Text: There are also some soldiers who just fell back in here. I'll entrust them to your care.

Name: Lee
Text: Sure. Thanks for taking care of the outside.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll contact you if there is a situation.

Name: Chrome
Text: "By the way, I found this outside the town. It seems to belong to Yazi."

Name: Pulao
Text: Lady Qu...? Kowloong is currently facing real hardship...

Name: Pulao
Text: Yes... Except those who were already lost.

Name: Qu
Text: No one could easily kill me.

Name: Qu
Text: The Kowloong people aren't intruders. You are.

Name: Qu
Text: How they see me is their own business.

Name: Qu
Text: This is the center of Tabula Akasha. Of course it's my usual post.

Name: Qu
Text: Even if I die... I will die here.

Name: Qu
Text: Kowloong has its own method to defeat all invaders.

Name: Pulao
Text: Yeah... I thought I could hide it...

Name: Pulao
Text: The people on the Nighter still need us. But we don't even know how to defeat these enemies.

Name: Pulao
Text: Sigh. I'll go take a walk...

Name: Qu
Text: Has no one told you that you should bow to a sovereign when entering her residence?

Name: Qu
Text: Whatever. I'll close one eye this time. Just don't touch anything.

Name: [Tip]
Text: The ending point has spawned near the elevator. You can go there anytime to end this stage.

Name: Qu
Text: "Instead of holding information from you, I would rather be open and honest."

Name: Lee
Text: Liv will come and treat you again later in the order of priority.

Name: Pulao
Text: "Um, actually... I found a letter earlier on. It was for you."

Name: Zhishi
Text: Not bad. Thanks to Liv and Wanshi...

Name: Medic
Text: You are also recovering exceptionally well. You must be very fit.

Name: Zhishi
Text: I have only heard her story from Grandpa. She and her father established Kowloong's glory and prosperity.

Name: Zhishi
Text: If she really is Lady Qu... I'm willing to follow her.

Name: Zhishi
Text: I'm sure she can make Kowloong thrive again!

Name: Zhishi
Text: I wronged him. I didn't even get to see him one last time...

Name: Zhishi
Text: "He won't be the only one. My father, and I... will do the same."

Name: Zhishi
Text: Hmm. It could be a part used on Blubber's exoskeleton. Let me take a look...
<color=#D1D1D1><size=35>Tabula Akasha Central Control Room</size></color>\n<size=28>Relocation and Evacuation</size>\n<size=28>1 hour till Huaxu's firewall collapses</size>

Name: Yazi
Text: "I last saw this ""Lady Qu"" in the battle of Kowloong. She didn't let the Nighter go home back then; I thought she would reject it forever."

Name: Yazi
Text: "But now that I think about it, she didn't really reject us back then, nor did she this time."

Name: Yazi
Text: I wonder if she has a better way to hold off the Punishing outside...

Name: Yazi
Text: Pulao must be feeling very lost too.

Name: Yazi
Text: I'll go help the Pulao Crew.

Name: Yazi
Text: "Oh, this is my umbrella indeed. Thanks."

Name: Yazi
Text: "Regardless of the weather, no matter what happens, I must hold this umbrella up for Kowloong..."

Name: Yazi
Text: I wonder if Lady Qu is alright...

Name: Hanged Man
Text: Anything I can do for you?

Name: Mr. Hu
Text: Could you move that rock away?

Name: He
Text: Right. There are too many people here. We don't have enough room to sit...

Name: Hanged Man
Text: Hello. Is there anything I can do for you?

Name: Kowloong Resident
Text: I don't feel like eating at all.

Name: Kowloong Resident
Text: At least have some porridge. You have to eat something...

Name: Liv
Text: "Are you done communicating with Commandant, Lee? How's it going?"

Name: Lee
Text: "Yeah, everything should be fine. The Pulao Crew are also doing good."

Name: Injured Worker
Text: "Oh, did you come from outside? Have the Chiwen Crew evacuated the people in the factory? My son—"

Name: Liv
Text: Ahem. Should we... change a topic?

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: I have never seen such a majestic building before...

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: We can't keep doing this forever...

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: Wait until the battle is over...

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: Best to ask Medic. She should be near the elevator...

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: Um... Anything I can help with?

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: "You mean her? Other than Medic, we still have a few more teammates outside. They should be with Strike Hawk now."

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: "Yeah, this female Construct is one of my teammates. Another one from my team is waiting outside, probably with other Babylonian Constructs."

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: I have been walking around here. I just want to check if there is anything I could help.

Name: Medic
Text: Don't give me more work to do. Just watch over this place.

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: "Alright then. When she's back, you should make her stay here and watch over the place. I'm better off fighting outside."

Name: Kowloong Crew Construct
Text: Um... Sorry for letting you see that.

Name: Lee
Text: I guess we are all just doing what we can.

Name: Cardboard box on the shelf
Text: The box seems to contain Qu's personal items.
"It has an antique style with a faint, lingering fragrance."

Name: Some paper documents scattered on the ground
Text: "The data consists of mostly parameters of Kowloong and the Nighter, with notes written by Qu."
She seems to really care about the life of the Nighter's residents.

Name: A still operating control terminal on the desk
Text: Qu seems to write random things and thoughts in this journal.
Even someone like Qu would also forget things occasionally...

Name: Documents on the wall
Text: "There is information about Luna, as well as forms of the Science Council."
"The operating parameters of Babylonia, a report about Hetero Tower, and a lot of other things..."
As well as the files of Gray Raven.
"Oops, I fell down again—Why did I say ""again""?"
"Help me, another Mr. Construct—Why did I say ""another""?"
"Please, help me one more time. I promise I won't fall again!"

Name: Stone Lion
Text: "I promise I will never run around again! Please, help me."

Name: Stone Lion
Text: "Thank you for being so kind to me, Mr. Construct."

Name: Kemuri
Text: Why is Guardian not back yet...?

Name: Kemuri
Text: Question. How did Guardian get back here?

Name: Luna
Text: "Hmph, still relying on your boring little tricks?"

Name: Luna
Text: "Whatever you're trying to do, I'll stop you."

Name: Luna
Text: "Whatever you're trying to do, I'll stop you."

Name: Selene
Text: "I understand, Luna. The shackles in your heart can't be easily removed."

Name: Selene
Text: "But because of that, your true growth will come when you break free from them."

Name: Selene
Text: You have immense potential. All you need is a little guidance.

Name: Selene
Text: I'll wait for you at the end.
"At last, the re-filtering process is about to begin."

Name: Luna
Text: She has planned all of this.

Name: Luna
Text: Get rid of the obstacles first.

Name: Luna
Text: "Remove the obstacles, and a path will show up."

Name: Selene
Text: The margin of error of real-life combat results is within the acceptable range.

Name: Selene
Text: This simulation is expected to reach theoretical benchmarks.

Name: Robotic Voice
Text:
<size=25>
 
 
> . . . Based on cumulative simulation results. . . . . . 
>> Activating. . . functionality enhancement protocol. . . . . . . . . . . </size>

Name: Robotic Voice
Text:
<size=25>
 
 
> Results align with. . . expected parameters. . . . . .  
>> Attempting to load. . . . . . [specific data] . . . . . . . . . </size>

Name: Robotic Voice
Text:
<size=25>
 
 
> Results align with expectations. . . . . . 
>> Concluding simulation. . . . . . . .</size>

Name: [Guide Placeholder]
Text: "Display indicator, prepare to check timeline trigger"

Name: [Placeholder]
Text: "Repeat teleporting 2 times -> After battle with enemy, show results: Result node not written yet"

Name: [Test Submission Instructions]
Text: Disable Luna's Core and Signature on the 1st wave of enemy; only Basic Attack enabled now

Name: [Test Submission Instructions]
Text: 3-Ping unlocked after the battle has started for some time (approx. 10s)

Name: —Select—
Text: Skip the simple tutorial of [Luna: Oblivion]?

Name: [Investigate]
Text: "The Hetero-Creature's saliva mixes with blood, painting a grim picture of the victim's final moments of torment."

Name: [Investigate]
Text: "Supplies are scattered all around the transport vehicle, while the driver is..."

Name: [Investigate]
Text: "Supplies are scattered all around the transport vehicle, while the driver is..."

Name: [Investigate]
Text: "Instead of the gun that flew off, what is in his hand is a blurry family photo—the last thing he held onto before he died."

Name: [Investigate]
Text: The body lies face down as if trying to protect something even in their final moment.

Name: [Investigate]
Text: A soldier's corpse lies there in a pool of liquid blood—they must have died not long ago.

Name: Andre
Text: "Hey, didn't that good-for-nothing lord of the city tighten their policies lately?"

Name: Axia
Text: "Lord? You mean Aleksei? If you ask me, that guy's nothing but a traitor to humanity."

Name: Andre
Text: Traitor? I've heard that this vile human—

Name: Andre
Text: —has been in cahoots with mechanoids for his own benefit.

Name: Axia
Text: I bet he even wants to turn himself into a mechanoid.

Name: Andre
Text: What is wrong with him? What doesn't he like about being human?

Name: Andre
Text: Why would he want to turn himself into a mechanoid?

Name: Axia
Text: Just like a hopeless machine geek.

Name: Axia
Text: Just like how I'm studying this wrecked car now.

Name: Andre
Text: About Aleksei being a hopeless machine geek...?

Name: Axia
Text: I heard that the guy even got his eyes replaced with mechanical ones recently.

Name: Axia
Text: "Oh, let's stop. That name annoys me so much I can't even fix the car properly."

Name: Patient Receiving Treatment
Text: "Tch, I thought the Corrupted only scratched my skin... ouch."

Name: Medical Staff
Text: Bear with me. It's not too bad.

Name: Patient Receiving Treatment
Text: The serum... Our team hasn't gotten any yet?

Name: Medical Staff
Text: We've only gotten a few vials. Those metal heads have been pretty stingy lately.

Name: Medical Staff
Text: The few vials we got went to the critically wounded. Just hang in there a little longer.

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: The brothers we lost today... we were still drinking together yesterday...

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: "Damn it, I can't stand this any longer."

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: Never thought I'd see the day where mechanoids would be the ones working us to death.

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: Tch... What right do they have to order us around?

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: "I heard there's a mechanoid in the city who takes in humans who can't work anymore,"

Name: Resting Soldier
Text: Maybe I should try my luck there... I'm so damn tired of living like this.

Name: Guard on Duty
Text: "In the city, we have to live under those metal scrap's thumb..."

Name: Guard on Duty
Text: "Outside, we have to deal with the Corrupted... *sigh*"

Name: Guard on Duty
Text: "Going back into the city sucks, but it ain't exactly safe wandering around out here either..."

Name: Guard on Duty
Text: I guess it's about time to head out.

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier
Text: "Oh, a human... Come with us then."

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier
Text: The convoy is taking a break. Feel free to look around.

Name: Hanying
Text: What... is this place? So many strange things going on... I should investigate the area first.

Name: Human Soldier
Text: Hurry up! It's not safe here.

Name: Human Soldier
Text: "Get in, we'll take you somewhere safe."

Name: Hanying
Text: I should play something to check if it's in tune.

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier D
Text: Such a beautiful piece. It reminds me of Kowloong...

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier D
Text: Yeah. I ended up here after Kowloong fell during the Punishing Virus outbreak.

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier D
Text: "How lucky I am to hear the sound of pipa in this remote place. You're a talented musician, ma'am."

Name: Hanying
Text: I appreciate it. You mentioned this is a remote place. Do you know where we are?

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier D
Text: "We're still in Kowloong territory, but we're far away from Kowloong itself. Humans have a hard time here. You'll understand when we arrive in the city."

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: Ah—was I in your way? My apologies.

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: I seem to have lost my necklace...

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: Are you... the one Captain just took in?

Name: Hanying
Text: I am. It appears something's bothering you. Can I help?

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: I lost my necklace when I was fighting those Corrupted.

Name: Hanying
Text: I found a necklace with a bullet pendant on my way here. Is this the one?

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: Yeah! That's the one! A toaster shot that bullet right into my head.

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: "Heh, but I survived, and now it's a memento... Feels like picking up an extra life to have this back. Thanks."

Name: Hanying
Text: "You're welcome. By the way, weren't you fighting the Corrupted? Who are these ""toasters""?"

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: "Who else? The mechanoids in the city, obviously. They were the ones who made us come here and fight the Corrupted."

Name: Human Soldier C
Text: You'll understand when you get to the city. Don't overthink it.

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier A
Text: Tch. Why are we even hauling all this scrap metal all the time?

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Stop guessing what those toasters in the city want.

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier A
Text: Tch. Why are we even hauling all this scrap metal all the time?

Name: Cargo Crew Soldier B
Text: Stop guessing what those toasters in the city want.

Name: Hanying
Text: Something's not right... Why is the convoy only delivering scrap metal?

Name: Injured Soldier A
Text: Tch. These Corrupted almost killed me.

Name: Injured Soldier B
Text: We wouldn't have come to this hellhole if it weren't for those toasters.

Name: Injured Soldier A
Text: Tch. These Corrupted almost killed me.

Name: Injured Soldier B
Text: We wouldn't have come to this hellhole if it weren't for those toasters.

Name: Injured Soldier A
Text: Hmph... They won't be hopping around anymore soon.

Name: Injured Soldier B
Text: What exactly are the supplies we're moving for?

Name: Injured Soldier A
Text: Keep your mouth shut. You'll know soon enough.

Name: Hanying
Text: It's not over yet? There must be a better way to fight them.

Name: Hanying
Text: Are those... tire tracks? They're a mess.

Name: Hanying
Text: Those transport vehicles might still be in danger. I have to find out where they are now.

Name: Hanying
Text: There are high concentrations of Punishing Virus on those tracks. The Hetero-Creatures must still be attacking the convoy.

Name: Hanying
Text: The trails are fresh. They should be nearby.

Name: Hanying
Text: I should check out that area.

Name: Hanying
Text: Time is running out. I need to make sure the convoy is safe.

Name: Hanying
Text: Right. I should be able to locate the convoy with these tracks.

Name: Hanying
Text: I may be able to pass through there... Should I go take a look?

Name: Hanying
Text: I need to clear these obstacles to take a closer look.

Name: Hanying
Text: A necklace with a bullet pendant? Someone must have dropped it accidentally. I'll bring it with me.

Name: Hanying
Text: There are still some Hetero-Creatures left. I can't just let them be.

Name: Hanying
Text: I don't think this is the way. I should turn back.

Name: Waiting for combat text...
Text: "Combat voiceovers are still being worked on. Without them, we can't sync the text and time them. Let's just use what we have for now=-=..."

Name: Elbow Strike!
Text: Elbow Strike on target! (Waiting for combat text and voice-over)

Name: Hanying
Text: Perhaps there's more to discover with this hairpin. I'll give it a shot.

Name: —Select—
Text: Skip battle and proceed to camp?

Name: Abbot
Text: A phantom... created by latent desires.

Name: Abbot
Text: Whatever form you take, it is still proof of who you are.

Name: Abbot
Text: It is the manifestation of your desires from your subconscious.

Name: Abbot
Text: Examine, judge, and choose your own path.

Name: Alpha
Text: Is this really the time to be spacing out?

Name: Alpha
Text: Save the sightseeing for another time.
Oh Buddha, have mercy and save us!
Survive... We just want to survive...
If the Buddha won't answer our prayers, then we can only blame our own misfortune...
Hunger, cold, despair... We can't take it anymore...
Are you here to save us?
What will happen to us if our leader also abandons us?!

Name: Alpha
Text: I'm right here. Draw your blade!

Name: Alpha
Text: I don't need to rest, but you should take a break.

Name: Alpha
Text: Come on, it's time to face the real thing.

Name: Alpha
Text: If the battle gets rough, hide.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: I'm not letting you fight alone.
Test subtitle, leave the name blank
